text: Slim lightfish, also known as Ichthyococcus elongatus, is a species of the genus Ichthyococcus.http://fishbase.org/summary/SpeciesSummary.php?genusname=Ichthyococcus&speciesname;=elongatus Slim lightfish info on Fishbase ==References== Category:Ichthyococcus Category:Fish described in 1941
title: Slim lightfish
